solution.text:
Area of Polygon = Area of Triangle (1) + Area of Trapezium (2) + Area of Triangle (3) + Area of Triangle (4) + Area of Triangle (5)
\(\frac 12 \times a \times b + \frac 12 (b + e)(c + d) + \frac 12 \times e \times f + \frac 12 \times g \times (d+f) + \frac 12 \times (a+c) \times g\)
\(= \frac 12 \times _{{2*j}}_ \times _{{(2*j)+1}}_ + \frac 12 \times _{{(2*j)+ 1 + (3*j*Decimal('0.2'))}}_ \times _{{2*j + 1 + j}}_ + \frac 12 \times _{{3*j*Decimal('0.2')}}_ \times _{{3*j*Decimal('0.5')}}_ + \frac 12 \times _{{2*j}}_ \times _{{j+(3*j*Decimal('0.5'))}}_ + \frac 12 \times _{{(2*j)+(2*j)+1}}_ \times _{{2*j}}_\)
\(=_{{ (Decimal('0.5')*(2*j)*((2*j)+1)) + (Decimal('0.5')*((2*j)+1+(3*j*Decimal('0.2')))*((2*j)+1+j)) + (Decimal('0.5')*(3*j*Decimal('0.2'))*(3*j*Decimal('0.5'))) + (Decimal('0.5')*(2*j)*(j+(3*j*Decimal('0.2')))) + (Decimal('0.5')*((2*j)+(2*j)+1)*(2*j)) }}_ cm^2\)

content.text: The unit in which the answer will be:
